meanings.sent1: The rushier car arrived first at the finish line.
meanings.sent2: She felt the rushier wind as she sped down the hill.
meanings.sent3: The rushier bunny hopped quickly to catch up with its friends.
meanings.sent4: His heart beat rushier as he approached the haunted house.
meanings.sent5: The rushier waterfall cascaded down the rocks with great force.

meanings.sent1: The rushier students finished their test before anyone else.
meanings.sent2: The rushier pace of the city made her feel anxious.
meanings.sent3: The rushier chef accidentally added too much salt to the dish.
meanings.sent4: The rushier traffic made the commute home unbearable.
meanings.sent5: His rushier speech made it hard for others to understand him.
